text: Huyen "Steven" Cheung (Chinese: 張振𤋮，born June 23, 1982) is an American political advisor who has been the White House Communications Director since 2025. He was President Donald Trump's campaign spokesman in the 2024 United States presidential election. He worked in Trump's 2016 and 2020 campaigns. In November 2024, Cheung was hired by Trump to be his White House Communications Director for his second administration. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Sacramento, California Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:White House Communications Directors
title: Steven Cheung (political advisor)
